scripts.build: react-scripts build && mv ./build/static/js/*.js ./build/static/js/main.js && mv ./build/static/css/*.css ./build/static/css/main.css  && mv ./build/static/js/*.js.map ./build/static/js/main.js.map && mv ./build/static/css/*.css.map ./build/static/css/main.css.map
scripts.build-win: react-scripts build && move .\build\static\js\*.js .\build\static\js\main.js && move .\build\static\css\*.css .\build\static\css\main.css  && move  .\build\static\js\*.js.map .\build\static\js\main.js.map && move .\build\static\css\*.css.map .\build\static\css\main.css.map
